name: CL34N-UP
description:
CL34N-UP

CL34N-UP is a game created by tcarter and scruff_duff for the #1st Simple Jam. We are glad to have taken part and feedback is greatly appreciated. 

To view ours and the other submissions please click : https://itch.io/jam/simple-jam-1st

Hailing from a nomadic space tribe - you make a living by mining minerals and making deposits.

You have 10 minutes to mine, collect and deposit as many minerals as you can.

 What's your highscore?

scruff_duff - Programming, 3D Modelling

tcarter - 3D Modelling, 2D Art, Music, FX, UI
